shareModal.title: Share Files
shareModal.message: Copy the link below and share it with your friends.

renameModal.messageFile: Choose a new name for this file.
renameModal.messageFolder: Choose a new name for this folder.

deleteModal.messageItem: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.
deleteModal.messageItem_plural: Are you sure you want to delete these items? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.
deleteModal.messageFolder: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.
deleteModal.messageFolder_plural: Are you sure you want to delete these folders? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.
deleteModal.messageFile: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.
deleteModal.messageFile_plural: Are you sure you want to delete these files? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.
